E-Mail Messages
Date: Sunday, 8/3/1992
Subject: Progress of Terry Mathews
Dear Sir,
Terry Mathews is doing pretty good at A Modesto A's!
He has an ERA of 1.57, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 8/21/1992
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more playing time.
I hope you put me in the starting lineup more often!

Regards,
John Stefero



Date: Monday, 9/1/1992
Subject: Progress of Mike Cameron

to promote him soon!
